recommendations: Fred De Jesus
Managing Director - IT at Charles Schwab
November 12, 2009, Fred was a client of Lindsay’s

First and foremost, Lindsey is an amazing person to partner with as a recruiter.  She has been responsive to both our Company and departmental needs; always delivering on her commitments.  Lindsay stays in tune with the changing organizational needs and internal processes,  She network's exceptionally well; and is able to tap, talented and reliable resources.   She consistently strives to showcase, qualified and talented individuals; sparing me the unnecessary burden of unqualified interviews.  I highly recommend her services; both for her exceptional work and  product deliverable.
Fred De Jesus

Ed Recinto
VP, Project Manager, Global Technology at McCann Worldgroup
August 20, 2009, Ed was a client of Lindsay’s

Lindsay's fantastic to work with.  A good recruiter really has to understand the personality of the hiring manager, as well as the group dynamic of the team that they're hiring into.  Lindsay is great at both.  In fact, she'll sometimes tell me that she's not sending me a candidate based solely on a lack of group fit, which is fantastic, because it means that the candidates she does send are very good matches all around.  Highly recommended her as an excellent recruiting partner!
